And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559>, Because the cry <WH2201> of Sodom <WH5467> and Gomorrah <WH6017> is great <WH7227>, and because their sin <WH2403> is very <WH3966> grievous <WH3513>;

And Abraham <WH85> drew near <WH5066>, and said <WH559>, Wilt thou consume <WH5595> the righteous <WH6662> with <WH5973> the wicked <WH7563>?

Peradventure there are <WH3426> fifty <WH2572> righteous <WH6662> within <WH8432> the city <WH5892>: wilt thou consume <WH5595> and not spare <WH5375> the place <WH4725> for <WH4616> the fifty <WH2572> righteous <WH6662> that are therein <WH7130>?

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559>, If I find <WH4672> in Sodom <WH5467> fifty <WH2572> righteous <WH6662> within <WH8432> the city <WH5892>, then I will spare <WH5375> all the place for their sake <WH4725>.
And Abraham <WH85> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559>, Behold now <WH2974>, I have taken upon me to speak <WH1696> unto the Lord <WH136>, who <WH595> am but dust <WH6083> and ashes <WH665>:

And he spake <WH1696> unto him yet again <WH3254>, and said <WH559>, Peradventure there shall be forty <WH705> found <WH4672> there <WH559>. And he said, I will not do <WH6213> it for the forty <WH705>'s sake.

And he said <WH559>, Oh <WH4994> let not the Lord <WH136> be angry <WH2734>, and I will speak <WH1696>: peradventure there shall thirty <WH7970> be found <WH4672> there <WH559>. And he said, I will not do <WH6213> it <WH4672>, if I find thirty there <WH7970>.

And he said <WH559>, Behold now <WH2974>, I have taken upon me to speak <WH1696> unto the Lord <WH136>: peradventure there shall be twenty <WH6242> found <WH4672> there <WH559>. And he said, I will not destroy <WH7843> it for the twenty <WH6242>'s sake.

And he said <WH559>, Oh let not the Lord <WH136> be angry <WH2734>, and I will speak <WH1696> yet <WH389> but this once <WH6471>: peradventure ten <WH6235> shall be found <WH4672> there <WH559>. And he said, I will not destroy <WH7843> it for the ten <WH6235>'s sake.
And Jehovah <WH3068> went his way <WH3212>, as soon as <WH834> he had left <WH3615> off communing <WH1696> with Abraham <WH85>: and Abraham <WH85> returned <WH7725> unto his place <WH4725>.
